00062 static void foreach_nodetree(Main *main, void *calldata, bNodeTreeCallback func)
00063 {
00064     Material *ma;
00065     Lamp *la;
00066     World *wo;
00067 
00068     for (ma= main->mat.first; ma; ma= ma->id.next)
00069         if (ma->nodetree)
00070             func(calldata, &ma->id, ma->nodetree);
00071 
00072     for (la= main->lamp.first; la; la= la->id.next)
00073         if (la->nodetree)
00074             func(calldata, &la->id, la->nodetree);
00075 
00076     for (wo= main->world.first; wo; wo= wo->id.next)
00077         if (wo->nodetree)
00078             func(calldata, &wo->id, wo->nodetree);
00079 }
00080 
00081 static void foreach_nodeclass(Scene *scene, void *calldata, bNodeClassCallback func)
00082 {
00083     func(calldata, NODE_CLASS_INPUT, IFACE_("Input"));
00084     func(calldata, NODE_CLASS_OUTPUT, IFACE_("Output"));
00085 
00086     if (scene_use_new_shading_nodes(scene)) {
00087         func(calldata, NODE_CLASS_SHADER, IFACE_("Shader"));
00088         func(calldata, NODE_CLASS_TEXTURE, IFACE_("Texture"));
00089     }
00090 
00091     func(calldata, NODE_CLASS_OP_COLOR, IFACE_("Color"));
00092     func(calldata, NODE_CLASS_OP_VECTOR, IFACE_("Vector"));
00093     func(calldata, NODE_CLASS_CONVERTOR, IFACE_("Convertor"));
00094     func(calldata, NODE_CLASS_GROUP, IFACE_("Group"));
00095     func(calldata, NODE_CLASS_LAYOUT, IFACE_("Layout"));
00096 }

00098 static void localize(bNodeTree *localtree, bNodeTree *UNUSED(ntree))
00099 {
00100     bNode *node, *node_next;
00101     
00102     /* replace muted nodes by internal links */
00103     for (node= localtree->nodes.first; node; node= node_next) {
00104         node_next = node->next;
00105         
00106         if (node->flag & NODE_MUTED) {
00107             nodeInternalRelink(localtree, node);
00108             nodeFreeNode(localtree, node);
00109         }
00110     }
00111 }
00112 
00113 static void local_sync(bNodeTree *localtree, bNodeTree *ntree)
00114 {
00115     bNode *lnode;
00116     
00117     /* copy over contents of previews */
00118     for (lnode= localtree->nodes.first; lnode; lnode= lnode->next) {
00119         if (ntreeNodeExists(ntree, lnode->new_node)) {
00120             bNode *node= lnode->new_node;
00121             
00122             if (node->preview && node->preview->rect) {
00123                 if (lnode->preview && lnode->preview->rect) {
00124                     int xsize= node->preview->xsize;
00125                     int ysize= node->preview->ysize;
00126                     memcpy(node->preview->rect, lnode->preview->rect, 4*xsize + xsize*ysize*sizeof(char)*4);
00127                 }
00128             }
00129         }
00130     }
00131 }

00133 static void update(bNodeTree *ntree)
00134 {
00135     ntreeSetOutput(ntree);
00136 }

00157 /* GPU material from shader nodes */
00158 
00159 void ntreeGPUMaterialNodes(bNodeTree *ntree, GPUMaterial *mat)
00160 {
00161     bNodeTreeExec *exec;
00162 
00163     exec = ntreeShaderBeginExecTree(ntree, 1);
00164 
00165     ntreeExecGPUNodes(exec, mat, 1);
00166 
00167     ntreeShaderEndExecTree(exec, 1);
00168 }

00180 /* XXX Group nodes must set use_tree_data to false, since their trees can be shared by multiple nodes.
00181  * If use_tree_data is true, the ntree->execdata pointer is checked to avoid multiple execution of top-level trees.
00182  */
00183 bNodeTreeExec *ntreeShaderBeginExecTree(bNodeTree *ntree, int use_tree_data)
00184 {
00185     bNodeTreeExec *exec;
00186     bNode *node;
00187     
00188     if (use_tree_data) {
00189         /* XXX hack: prevent exec data from being generated twice.
00190          * this should be handled by the renderer!
00191          */
00192         if (ntree->execdata)
00193             return ntree->execdata;
00194     }
00195     
00196     /* ensures only a single output node is enabled */
00197     ntreeSetOutput(ntree);
00198     
00199     /* common base initialization */
00200     exec = ntree_exec_begin(ntree);
00201     
00202     /* allocate the thread stack listbase array */
00203     exec->threadstack= MEM_callocN(BLENDER_MAX_THREADS*sizeof(ListBase), "thread stack array");
00204     
00205     for (node= exec->nodetree->nodes.first; node; node= node->next)
00206         node->need_exec= 1;
00207     
00208     if (use_tree_data) {
00209         /* XXX this should not be necessary, but is still used for cmp/sha/tex nodes,
00210          * which only store the ntree pointer. Should be fixed at some point!
00211          */
00212         ntree->execdata = exec;
00213     }
00214     
00215     return exec;
00216 }
00217 
00218 /* XXX Group nodes must set use_tree_data to false, since their trees can be shared by multiple nodes.
00219  * If use_tree_data is true, the ntree->execdata pointer is checked to avoid multiple execution of top-level trees.
00220  */
00221 void ntreeShaderEndExecTree(bNodeTreeExec *exec, int use_tree_data)
00222 {
00223     if (exec) {
00224         bNodeTree *ntree= exec->nodetree;
00225         bNodeThreadStack *nts;
00226         int a;
00227         
00228         if (exec->threadstack) {
00229             for (a=0; a<BLENDER_MAX_THREADS; a++) {
00230                 for (nts=exec->threadstack[a].first; nts; nts=nts->next)
00231                     if (nts->stack) MEM_freeN(nts->stack);
00232                 BLI_freelistN(&exec->threadstack[a]);
00233             }
00234             
00235             MEM_freeN(exec->threadstack);
00236             exec->threadstack= NULL;
00237         }
00238         
00239         ntree_exec_end(exec);
00240         
00241         if (use_tree_data) {
00242             /* XXX clear nodetree backpointer to exec data, same problem as noted in ntreeBeginExecTree */
00243             ntree->execdata = NULL;
00244         }
00245     }
00246 }
00247 
00248 void ntreeShaderExecTree(bNodeTree *ntree, ShadeInput *shi, ShadeResult *shr)
00249 {
00250     ShaderCallData scd;
00255     Material *mat = shi->mat;
00256     bNodeThreadStack *nts = NULL;
00257     bNodeTreeExec *exec = ntree->execdata;
00258     
00259     /* convert caller data to struct */
00260     scd.shi= shi;
00261     scd.shr= shr;
00262     
00263     /* each material node has own local shaderesult, with optional copying */
00264     memset(shr, 0, sizeof(ShadeResult));
00265     
00266     /* ensure execdata is only initialized once */
00267     if (!exec) {
00268         BLI_lock_thread(LOCK_NODES);
00269         if (!ntree->execdata)
00270             ntree->execdata = ntreeShaderBeginExecTree(ntree, 1);
00271         BLI_unlock_thread(LOCK_NODES);
00272 
00273         exec = ntree->execdata;
00274     }
00275     
00276     nts= ntreeGetThreadStack(exec, shi->thread);
00277     ntreeExecThreadNodes(exec, nts, &scd, shi->thread);
00278     ntreeReleaseThreadStack(nts);
00279     
00280     // \note: set material back to preserved material
00281     shi->mat = mat;
00282     /* better not allow negative for now */
00283     if (shr->combined[0]<0.0f) shr->combined[0]= 0.0f;
00284     if (shr->combined[1]<0.0f) shr->combined[1]= 0.0f;
00285     if (shr->combined[2]<0.0f) shr->combined[2]= 0.0f;
00286 }
